hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Abdul-Wahid bin Hamzah that 'Abbad bin 'Abdullah bin Az-Zubair told him that 'Aishah said:"the Messenger of Allah did not offer the funeral prayer for Suhail bin Baida anywhere but inside the Masjid

chapter.ara-name: باب الصَّلاَةِ عَلَى الْجَنَازَةِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
chapter.eng-name: Offering the funeral prayer in the Masjid
